spell.name: Acrid Zephyr
entries: Manifest a downdraft of caustic gas onto a target you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 2d4} acid damage. If the creature ends its next turn in the same space in which it failed the saving throw, it takes additional acid damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier.
This spell's primary damage increases by {@dice 1d4} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 3d4}), 11th level ({@dice 4d4}), and 17th level ({@dice 5d4}).

spell.name: Aftershock
entries: A violent tremor blasts out from you along the ground for 80 feet. Each creature touching the ground in the spell's area must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 11d10} bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the target takes half the damage and is not knocked {@condition prone}.
Creatures in the area that are underground or {@condition prone} make their save at disadvantage. Structures and objects on the ground are damaged by this spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 8th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d10} for each slot level above 7th.

spell.name: Armor of Stone
entries: For the duration jagged plates of arcane force surround you. You gain 60 temporary hit points for the duration. While these temporary hit points exist, you have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage and your speed is reduced by 10 feet.
When the last temporary hit point is expended, each creature within 10 feet must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 3d10} bludgeoning damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the temporary hit points increase by 10 for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Arc Veil
entries: Until the spell ends, lightning crackles along your skin and gear, and you gain the following benefits:
Whenever you are subjected to lightning damage, you take no damage and instead regain a number of hit points equal to half the lightning damage dealt.
Creatures that move within 10 feet of you or end their turn their take {@damage 1d8} lightning damage.
You can use an action to teleport to an unoccupied space within 15 feet. When you appear, any creature within 5 feet must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 4d8} lightning damage.

spell.name: Backdraft

m.text: chalk laced with ruby dust worth 100gp, which the spell consumes

entries: Lace a door, window, or other entryway with a rune of primordial fire. When the entryway is opened, fire blasts from the entryway, consuming everything in a 15-foot cube. A creature caught in the flames must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 5d12} fire damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one. The fire goes around corners and through spaces as small as one inch.
Unattended objects within the blast area are also damaged by this spell.

spell.name: Blackwind's Sonorous Singularity
entries: Speaking a word of power causes a 5-foot diameter sphere to form in an unoccupied space within range. A 20-foot radius sphere around the singularity is buffeted by contracting waves of explosive force that draw creatures and objects toward the singularity. The area is difficult terrain.

When a creature enters the affected area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, the creature must succeed on a Strength saving throw or take {@damage 3d6} bludgeoning damage and be drawn 10- feet straight toward the singularity in the center of the spell. While in the area of effect, a creature has disadvantage on ranged weapon attack rolls and Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.
At the start of each of your turns, the area of the spell expands by 5 feet in every direction, out to a maximum radius of 70 feet.

The spell ends early if a creature is pulled into the same space as the singularity in the center. When the spell ends, there is a thunderous detonation, audible out to a distance of 1 mile. Every creature caught in the area of effect must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@dice 20d6 + 30} points of thunder damage from the explosion and are permanently {@condition deafened}. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition deafened}. A creature adjacent to the singularity takes additional thunder damage equal to the radius of the sphere before it detonates.

spell.name: Blossoms of Cathrys
entries: Summon a 60-foot cube of thick colorful foliage from the Crimson Jungle of Tartarus. The area provides three-quarters cover to creatures inside and behind it and is difficult terrain.

In addition, when a creature enters the area for the first time on its turn or starts its turn in the foliage, it must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 8d6} acid damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one as the plants begin to digest them.
Objects created of Stone or Metal in the area take the damage at the start of your turn.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the area increases by 5 feet and the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above the 6th.

spell.name: Burial

m.text: an opal worth 50 gp, which the spell consumes

entries: You channel elemental force through a creature you touch. Make a melee spell attack. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 8d10} bludgeoning damage. In addition, a creature standing on earth (such as clay, mud, stone, or sand) must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or be pulled into the ground. Huge or larger creatures automatically succeed on their saving throw to avoid being buried.

A creature that starts its turn entombed in this way cannot breathe. While buried, the creature is {@condition blinded}, {@condition deafened}, and {@condition restrained}. As an action, the creature may attempt to unearth themselves with a Strength (Athletics) check against your spell save DC. On a success, they emerge, {@condition prone}, in the space they last occupied.

spell.name: Caustic Shroud

m.text: the preserved acid gland of a mimic wrapped in woven spider silk, worth at least 1,000 gold pieces

entries: An adhesive sheet of sizzling acid wraps around a creature or object within range. The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw, taking {@damage 10d8} acid damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

While affected by this spell, the target takes one fewer damage die worth of acid damage at the start of each of its turns ({@dice 9d8}, {@dice 8d8}, etc). The target or an adjacent creature can use its action to make a Dexterity check against your spell save DC. On a success, the target escapes the viscous sheet of acid covering it and the spell ends.

spell.name: Charged Shock

components.m: a copper nail, a piece of quartz, and a bit of silver wire

entries: Channel potent electrical energy into your clenched fist. As an action, you can release the spell, which leaps to one creature of your choice within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 10d8} lightning damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one.

Alternatively, you can use a bonus action on your subsequent turns to charge additional energy into the spell. Each bonus action used to charge the spell increases its damage by {@dice 1d8} (to a maximum of {@dice 15d8}).
If you lose concentration on the spell or fail to cast it before the duration ends, it discharges in your hand as though cast targeting you. You have resistance to the damage of the spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 8th or 9th level, you can hold the charged spell for 10 minutes before releasing it.

spell.name: Charge Metal
entries: With a word, you infuse electricity into a metal object you can see within range, such as a metal weapon or a suit of heavy or medium metal armor.  A creature in physical contact with the object takes {@damage 1d6} lightning damage when you cast the spell. The target takes the damage again at the start of its turn.

If a creature is holding or wearing the object and takes damage from this spell, the creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or drop the object if it can. If it doesn't drop the object, it has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws until the start of your next turn.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Cloak of Embers
entries: A retaliatory bulwark cascades around you in the form of a smoldering veil of cinders. For the duration, when a creature hits you with a melee attack, reduce the damage of the attack by {@dice 1d6}. The attacker takes the same amount of fire damage. After 3 melee attacks are mitigated, the spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, the spell can mitigate up to five attacks before ending. When you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the reduction and damage also increase by {@dice 1d6}.

spell.name: Combust
entries: Snap your fingers at a target within range, blasting them with a sudden eruption of flame. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 5d10} fire damage.

On a successful save, this spell creates a small magical fire in the creature's space that lingers for 1 minute. A creature that enters the flames for the first time on its turn or ends its turn there takes {@damage 2d6} fire damage

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Corroding Crown

m.text: emerald-laced paste worth 10gp, which the spell consumes

entries: When you cast this spell, a 10-foot glittering green circle appears on a solid surface of your choice (such as a floor, ceiling, or table); only you can see the green ring.

When a creature other than you enters the circle, it erupts in a fountain of caustic sludge. The creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save the target takes {@damage 5d4} acid damage and continues to be seared by the sticky liquid. For 1 minute, at the end of each of their turns they take an additional {@damage 3d4} acid damage.

The affected creature or a creature that can touch it can, as an action, attempt to scrape away the sludge by succeeding on a Dexterity check opposed by your Spell Save DC, ending the effect on a success.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the initial damage increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Corrosive Integument

time.condition: which you take when a creature or object grapples or restrains you

components.m: a pickled flatworm in a galvanized vial

entries: A thin protective barrier springs into existence over your body and gear, oozing an acrid liquid that burns anything it touches other than you.

For the duration, any creature or object that grapples, touches, or hits you with a melee attack takes {@damage 2d4} acid damage at the end of their turn. When a creature takes damage from this spell, you gain temporary hit points equal to half the damage done.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Crashing Call
entries: A creature within range is blasted by your amplified voice. The target must make a Constitution saving throw, taking {@damage 1d6} thunder damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.
Additionally, a creature targeted by this spell has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws to maintain concentration on a spell until the start of your next turn.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level, the damage increases by {@dice 3d6}. At 4th level, the range increases to 60 feet.

spell.name: Cremation
entries: With a word of power, a target you can see within range is violently incinerated by unquenchable black flames. A creature must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 15d6 + 80} fire damage. In addition, a creature that has no Legendary Actions and is Huge or smaller has one of its limbs reduced to ash.

On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and does not lose a limb. A creature that is reduced to 0 hit points by this spell is reduced to a blackened shadow on a nearby surface, along with all non-magical items in its possession.

Alternatively, you may target an object within range. Large or smaller non-magical objects not immune to fire damage are destroyed by heat, reduced to ash, vapor, or molten slag. An object that is Huge or Gargantuan has a 20-foot cube of material destroyed by this spell.

Magical objects targeted by this spell are not destroyed by it, but instead glow white-hot for 24 hours. Any creature that starts its turn in physical contact with the magical object takes {@damage 15d6} fire damage.

If a creature is holding or wearing the object while in this state, the creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or drop the object if it can. If it remains in contact with the object, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until it drops the item.

spell.name: Crystal Spire

m.text: a carved crystal needle worth at least 250 gp

entries: A 10-foot radius, 20-foot tall crystal sprouts from the ground within range. The crystal has 150 hit points, an armor class of 18, and immunity to fire, cold, and lightning damage.

As a bonus action on each of your turns, you may cause a needle-sharp branch of crystal to dart out at one creature within 30 feet of the spire. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 10d10} piercing damage.
A creature killed by the spire is drained, granting the spire 20 temporary hit points. The creature's corpse is encases in crystal after 24 hours unless removed from the branch that pierced it.

If you concentrate on the spell for the full duration, the spire becomes permanent but inactive. If the spell is cast again on an alreaddy existing spire, the spire doubles in size, gains 150 temporary hit points and functions normally as per the spell.
If the spire is destroyed, the spell ends and another crystal spire cannot be grown from within 800 feet of the previous one for 1,000 years.

spell.name: Curtain of the Scorched Queen

m.text: 50gp worth of ruby dust, which the spell consumes

entries: A massive sheet of flame flares into existence extending 150 feet in a straight line from you. The wall of flame is 5 feet thick and 80 feet tall. The flames are opaque and last for the duration.
When the wall appears, each creature within its area must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 12d6} fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.
A creature that comes within 10 feet of the wall or ends their turn there takes {@damage 6d6} fire damage. A creature takes the same damage if it attempts to pass through the wall.
The curtain of flame is semi-solid. Creatures attempting to pass through the wall must succeed on a Strength check against your spell save DC or be rebuffed.

spell.name: Deep Freeze

components.m: a flask of cold water, a pinch of salt, and a tuft of yeti fur)

entries: You attempt to infuse a creature or body of water within range with elemental ice.

You can freeze up to 10,000 gallons of liquid, such as fresh or salt water, completely solid. The liquid remains frozen solid until the spell ends, after which it thaws normally. Hot liquid such as boiling oil, molten metal, or lava are made solid and cool to the touch by this spell.

If a creature made of a physical substance such as flesh, stone, or metal, is targeted by this spell, it must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target's speed is reduced to 0. On a successful save, the creature is unaffected by the spell.

A creature whose speed is reduced by this spell must make another Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns. The spell ends if the creature succeeds on any saving throw against the spell. Each time it fails an additional saving throw, it suffers one level of {@condition exhaustion}. A creature that dies due to this effect is frozen solid.

spell.name: Drumfire Echo
entries: Conjure a non-stop barrage of thunderous crashes in a 30-foot cube for the duration. Creatures that enter the area or start their turn there must make a Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 8d6} thunder damage. While in the area, creatures have disadvantage on concentration checks and are {@condition deafened}.
The spell ends early if the area is covered in a silence spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the area of effect increases by 5 feet for each spell slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Enkindling Spirit
entries: You summon the vengeful spirit of a humanoid that died consumed by fire. The spirit appears in a space you can see within range and lasts for the duration. The spirit is wreathed in ghostly flames.
When you cast the spell, you can make a melee spell attack against a creature within 5 feet of the spirit. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 4d6 + 10} fire damage.
As a bonus action on your turn, you can command the spirit to move 30 feet and repeat the attack against a creature within 5 feet of it.

spell.name: Erode

components.m: ground lemon peel in sour milk

entries: The natural acids present in a creature you can see within range magnify, consuming them from the inside. The target must make a Constitution saving throw, taking {@damage 10d8} acid damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one.
If you do not roll a 1 on any of the damage die, a target that failed its saving throw takes an additional {@dice 5d8} points of acid damage at the end of their next turn.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage (both initial and subsequent) increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Fissure
entries: A 60-foot long, 5-foot wide, 5-foot deep rupture appears on a surface within range. Creatures in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes {@damage 5d10} bludgeoning damage and falls {@condition prone} at the bottom of the fissure. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage and is pushed to an unoccupied space at the edge of the fissure.

This spell deals double damage to objects and structures made of stone or earth. Additionally, the ground in that area becomes difficult terrain until cleared away. Each 5-foot-square portion of the area requires at least 1 minute to clear by hand.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 4th

spell.name: Freezing Armament
entries: Wreath a weapon in a devastating polar aura that saps vigor from the target. The next time an attack is made with the weapon or piece of ammunition, the target of that attack must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, they take {@damage 1d8} cold damage, their speed reduced to 0 until the end of their next turn, and the spell ends. On a successful save, the creature's speed is halved until the end of their next turn.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Fulminate
entries: With a gesture and a word, you enshroud one creature in range with blistering arcs of lightning. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 12d8} lightning damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one. On a failed save, the target is also suffused with crackling lightning for the duration. Creatures wearing medium or heavy armor, or creatures composed mostly of metal, have disadvantage on their saving throws against this spell.

Lightning sparks and flickers along the surface of the target and sheds dim light in a 10-foot radius. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the saving throw, taking {@damage 6d8} lightning damage on a failed save. On a successful save, the spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 9th level, the damage increases by {@dice 3d8} and the duration becomes 10 minutes.

spell.name: Glacial Deadfall
entries: A continuous 20-foot long, 5-foot wide sheet of glacial ice forms on a surface within range. The block of ice clings to the surface for the duration or until the spell ends.
The glacial ice is nearly as strong as stone and can be used to bridge gaps as wide as 10 feet. The ice is considered difficult terrain.

When the spell ends, the ice bursts apart. Each creature within 5 feet of the ice must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 3d6} bludgeoning damage and {@damage 3d6} cold damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the length or width of the ice increases by 10 feet for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Glaciate
entries: A spray of liquid ice springs from your outstretched hand onto a target you can see within range. The target can be a creature or an object not made of ice.

A creature targeted by this spell must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 10d8 + 60} cold damage and suffers one level of {@condition exhaustion}. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, it is frozen into solid ice.

If the spell is used to target an object smaller than 60 feet on a side, the object turns to solid ice. If the object is larger than that, this spell turns a 60 foot cube of it into ice. Each 10 ft portion of ice has 12 AC and 30 hit points as well as vulnerability to fire damage. Magic items are unaffected by this spell. Any creature that ends their turn within 10 feet of an object turned to ice in this way takes {@damage 3d8} cold damage.

Alternatively, this spell can be used to flashfreeze a wide expanse of still or slowly flowing water. The most common use is to freeze up to a 10-mile long, 1-foot deep bridge of ice to traverse a lake or slow river. This spell can also freeze a 100-foot cube of water into solid ice. Creatures submerged in the water when it is frozen by this spell take 100 points of cold damage and are {@condition restrained} until they thaw or break free.

spell.name: Grip of Winter
entries: Channel blistering cold through your outstretched hand. Make a melee spell attack. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d12} cold damage and their speed is halved for 1 minute.
A creature affected by this spell makes a Constitution saving throw at the end of its turn. On a successful save, the effect ends for it.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Heighten Flames
entries: Strengthen a 30-foot cube of non-magical flames within range. Fire within the area is heightened in the following ways:
Flames shed bright light and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

Medium flames, such as that of a hearth or campfire double in height. At the start of your turn, the fire spreads outward 5 feet in all directions, provided wood or other fuel is present in the new locations.

Flames grow much hotter. When a creature would be damaged by the non-magical flames, they take the highest number possible for each damage die. For example, instead of taking {@dice 2d6} points of damage, a creature takes 12.
While within the area of effect, creatures that have resistance to fire damage lose their resistance. Creatures immune to fire damage remain unaffected.

spell.name: Icicle Tempest
entries: You bring forth a tumultuous storm from the Paraelemental Plane of Ice in a 60-foot radius 300-foot high cylinder within range.
A creature that starts its turn inside the storm must make a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 3d6} piercing damage and {@damage 3d6} cold damage as foot-long icicles plummet down upon them.
A creature that ends its turn within the area of the spell must make a Constitution saving throw, taking 20 cold damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.
After one round, the ground within the area of the storm becomes difficult terrain.

spell.name: Icy Glaze
entries: Icy mist swirls into existence in a 5-foot cube within range, covering everything in the area with a frozen slurry. Creatures in the area when the spell is cast must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} cold damage and have their speed halved until the end of their next turn.
This spell's area increases by 5 feet when you reach 5th level (10-foot cube), 11th level (15-foot cube), and 17th level (20-foot cube).

spell.name: Inferno

m.text: ruby dust worth 100gp suspended in oil

entries: A searing blast of fire consumes everything in a 20-foot cube originating from you. Creatures in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 12d6} fire damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one.

The flames caused by this spell remain for the duration. As an action on subsequent turns, you may cause the area to erupt again. Creatures in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw against the spell's damage as though you cast it again.
The spell ends if you use your action to do anything else or move from the space from which you originally cast the spell.

spell.name: Jolt
entries: You unleash an arc of lightning from your outstretched hand to one creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d8} lightning damage. The lightning then arcs to another creature of your choice within 5 feet of the target, dealing lightning damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier to that creature.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d8}), 11th level ({@dice 3d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d8}).

spell.name: Lightning's Demesne

m.text: splinters of sapphire worth 100gp, which the spell consumes

entries: Summon forth the primordial essence of lightning in a 60-foot cube within range. Creatures wearing metal armor or comprised of metal, such as an Iron Golem, who enter the area for the first time on their turn or start their turn there must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 3d8} lightning damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one.
Creatures that fly within this spell's area of effect take {@damage 2d8} lightning damage for each 5 feet of movement they spend flying, scorched by the pulsing spiderweb of electricity in the air.
Creatures that are damaged by a lightning spell of 3rd level or lower while within the area of lightning's demesne have vulnerability to the damage of that spell.

spell.name: Living Boulder

components.m: a leather pouch filled with stones and clay

entries: A 5-foot-diameter sphere of rock and clay appears in an unoccupied space within range and lasts for the duration.

As a bonus action, you can move the sphere up to 30 feet. If you ram the sphere into a creature, that creature must make a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 2d10} bludgeoning damage, and the sphere stops moving this turn.

When you move the sphere, you can direct it over barriers up to 5 feet tall and jump it across pits up to 10 feet wide. The sphere of stone removes difficult terrain caused by earth, stone, or foliage in any space it moves through.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Melting Kiss

m.text: a vulture's stomach lined with emerald dust worth 50gp

entries: Using your pursed lips, plant a caustic mark on a creature or object. Make a melee spell attack. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d4} acid damage at the start of each of its turns for the duration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, you can maintain your concentration on the spell for up to 10 minutes. When you use a spell slot of 9th level, you can maintain your concentration on the spell for up to 1 hour.

spell.name: Mordant Expanse

components.m: a glob of black pudding ooze

entries: A 30-foot-radius spherical bubble filled with acidic fumes emanates from a point you choose within range. Objects may pass into and out of the bubble unimpeded. Creatures inside the fume-filled sphere are lightly obscured. Each creature in the sphere when it appears or that ends its turn there must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 3d4} acid damage.

Until the spell ends, you can use a bonus action on each of your turns to cause a gout of sizzling acid to vomit from the inside of the sphere. Make a ranged spell attack against a creature within the bubble. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 8d4} acid damage.
Creatures within the sphere have disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks based on sight and can smell only sulfur.

spell.name: Quagmire
entries: You transform a 5-foot unoccupied section of dirt, stone, sand, or mud into a soft bog that gives way underfoot. Creatures who enter the area must succeed on a Strength saving throw or have their speed reduced to 0 until the start of their next turn. A creature can use an action to make a Wisdom (Perception) check versus your spell save DC to discern which spaces are quagmires.
The number of active effects you can have at one time increases by 1 when you reach 5th level (2), 11th level (3), and 17th level (4).

spell.name: Raucous Blast
entries: A focused blast of thunder forming a line 30 feet long and 10 feet wide explodes out from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the line must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes {@damage 5d6} thunder damage and is {@condition deafened} until the start of your next turn. On a successful save they take half damage and are not {@condition deafened}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Roaring Aegis
entries: A trembling barrier of air surrounds you for the duration, causing your form to shutter unnaturally to those that look at you.
Whenever you take bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage, the barrier absorbs half the damage. While the barrier persists, you are {@condition deafened}.
After absorbing 30 points of damage, the spell ends and every creature within 5 feet of you must make a Constitution saving throw or take 20 thunder damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the total damage the spell can absorb increases by 8 for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Searing Palm
entries: Channel extreme heat through your open hand. Make a melee spell attack. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d12} fire damage. If the target is a creature or object made of wood, clay, stone, or flammable material, this spell sears a blackened hand-print into the material.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d12} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d12}), 11th level ({@dice 3d12}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d12}).

spell.name: Snows of Porphatys
entries: A 150-foot radius, 500-foot high cylinder of driving black snowfall springs into existence at a point you choose on a surface within range. The snowfall lasts for the duration.

When the cylinder appears, each creature within its area must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage 2d8} acid damage and {@damage 2d8} cold damage, or half as much damage on a successful save. A creature must also make this saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there.

Flying creatures caught in the searing black snowstorm must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be driven 30 feet toward the ground. Huge or smaller creatures fully within the area of effect have their speed halved.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 9th level, you can maintain your concentration on the spell for up to 10 minutes.

spell.name: Stone Flinders
entries: A stone held in your hand shatters, spraying a creature you can see within range with splinters of stone. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d10} piercing damage. If the target moves before the start of your next turn, the creature takes an additional {@damage 1d10} piercing damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Stone Shackles of the Merciless King

m.text: an emerald worth 500gp and a band of iron, which the spell consumes

entries: Heavy stone shackles appear on the legs of a creature within range. Creatures that have no legs or corporeal body are unaffected by this spell.

When the shackles appear, the creature's speed is reduced to 5 feet and it cannot dash. If the creature teleports, the shackles teleport with them. The shackles have 200 hit points, are immune to nonmagical damage, can't be affected or detected by spells of 4th level or higher, and has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

Each time the shackles take damage, are targeted by a spell, or tampered with, the creature shackled by them takes {@damage 15d10} piercing damage as needle-sharp spines of stone bore into their legs. Cold, regal laughter can be heard each time the shackles deal damage to the impeded creature.
Creatures who attempt to cut their legs away to free themselves find the missing limbs cannot be restored by anything short of a Wish spell.

spell.name: Storm of Biting Dust
entries: A 30-foot radius sphere of swirling dust forms within range. The sphere spreads around corners, and its area is lightly obscured. It lasts for the duration or until a wind of moderate or greater speed (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses it. Creatures who start their turn within the cloud must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} bludgeoning damage and be {@condition blinded} until the end of their turn.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Storm Plummet

components.m: a vial of blue dragon's blood

entries: A thin flash of energy streaks into the sky from your raised hand. Moments later, an enormous sphere of lightning crashes to the ground at a point you can see. Each creature within a 20-foot radius 1,000-foot-tall cylinder where the sphere falls must make a Constitution saving throw. The sphere spreads around corners and passes through spaces as small as one inch.

Lightning arcs between each creature caught in the area of this spell. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage 8d8} lightning damage for each creature in the area (to a maximum of {@dice 48d8}). On a successful save, a creature takes half the damage.
Creatures wearing metal armor or comprised mostly of metal have disadvantage on the saving throw.

spell.name: Storm Surge
entries: From your hands, a wave of crackling energy sweeps out, electrocuting everything in its path. Each creature in a 20-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 3d8} lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Summits of Colothys

components.m: the bone of a corpse struck by lightning

entries: You create a circular wall of ozone-smelling blacked crags within range. The circle has a 60-foot radius, is 20-foot high, and 10 feet thick. The circle appears only on a solid surface and lasts for the duration.
The wall blocks line of sight and requires a successful climb check opposed by your spell save DC to traverse.

When the ring of stone appears, each creature other than you within its area must make a Dexterity saving throw as lightning strikes out from the black stones. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage 7d8} lightning damage, or half as much damage on a successful save.

As an action on subsequent turns, while you are within the circle, you may use your action to cause a bolt of lightning to strike a creature within the circle. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 7d8} lightning damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one.
Creatures standing atop the ring of stones automatically fail Dexterity saving throws to avoid damage caused by this spell.

spell.name: Thunder Cannon
entries: A concussive blast audible out to distance of 1 mile roars out from you. Each creature in a 75-foot cone must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes {@damage 10d6} thunder damage and is shoved to the edge of the spell's effect. On a successful save, the target takes half damage and is not pushed. Objects not being carried or worn are also pushed directly away from you to the end of this spell's effect.  If there is an obstacle, such as a wall, that stops a target before it reaches the edge of the spell's area, they slam against the obstacle, taking {@damage 1d6} damage for every 5 feet they are flung before striking the surface.

spell.name: Thundercrash
entries: From a word, a thunderous wave of energy explodes out from you for 20 feet in all directions. Creatures caught in the blast must succeed on a Strength saving throw or take {@damage 7d6} thunder damage and be blasted 10 feet straight back.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Thunder Palm
entries: A concussive blast resounds when you clap your hand upon an enemy. Make a melee touch attack. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d8} thunder damage. A Medium or smaller creature is also pushed 5 feet away from you.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d8}), 11th level ({@dice 3d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d8}).

spell.name: Tumultuous Sector

m.text: an opal worth at least 50 gp which the spell consumes

entries: Enhance the volume inside a 40-foot cube within range. For the duration, any noise created in the area is amplified by several magnitudes. A whisper sounds like a yell; a sword hitting a shield sounds like thunder.
Creatures moving through the area, even at half speed, make enough noise to be heard out to a distance of 30 feet. Stealth checks made in this area take a -10 penalty.

All creatures in the area take {@damage 1d6} thunder damage each time a creature uses an Action to attack, cast a spell, or interact with an object made of wood, stone, or metal. Additionally, thunder spells cast into or inside the area deal an additional {@damage 3d6} thunder damage.

spell.name: Undulating Limbs
entries: Four 20-foot-long prehensile tentacles of black acidic ooze spring from your body until the spell ends. You can use a bonus action and lash out with a tentacle to attack one creature or object within 20 feet of you. When you do so, make a melee spell attack. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 8d4} acid damage.

Whether you hit or miss, the tentacle explodes in a shower of acid. The target and each creature within 10 feet of it must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 4d4} acid damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one. The spell ends early if you expend the last tentacle. For each tentacle you have remaining, your climb and swim speed is increased by 5 feet.

spell.name: Voltaic Spear
entries: Lightning lances from your cupped hands to a target within range. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 6d8} lightning damage.
Additionally, up to three creatures within 10 feet of the target must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 2d8} lightning damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the initial damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Watchful Arctic Geysers

m.text: a source of water or pile of snow and a white spinel gemstone worth 10gp, which the spell consumes

entries: You infuse 3 water sources no larger than 5 feet on a side with arcane magic. Until the spell ends, whenever a creature other than you comes within 20 feet of one of the enchanted water sources, a gout of polar slush blasts out to strike them. The creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 3d6} cold damage and have their speed reduced by half for 1 minute. The water source is then expended.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the number of sources that can be affected increases by one for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Whisper Blast

time.condition: which you take when a creature comes within 5 feet of you

entries: A whisper becomes a thunderous boom, slamming into a creature that approaches you. The creature must succeed on a Strength saving throw or take {@damage 13d6} thunder damage and be pushed 10 feet back.

A creature that can hear who is targeted by this spell is {@condition deafened} for 1 minute. They can make a Constitution saving throw at the end of each of their turns to end the {@condition deafened} condition.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 6th.

spell.name: Whiteout

components.m: the fingernail of a corpse that was frozen to death

entries: A squall of biting snow and freezing rain spreads from a point you choose within range to fill a 50-foot radius sphere. The squall lasts for the duration.
A creature has disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks to see or hear through this magical blizzard. Non-magical flames in the area of extinguished.

Whenever a creature starts its turn in the sphere, it must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save the creature takes {@damage 8d8} cold damage. On a successful save they take half as much cold damage. A creature that dies inside the spell's radius is frozen solid.

spell.name: Wildfire
entries: Ghostly blood-red flames fill a 40-foot square on the ground that you can see within range. Creatures who start their turn in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 3d8} fire damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one.
Man-made objects and creatures within the area are damaged by this spell, but natural flora is left unharmed.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Zerd's Bonk of Bitter Cold

components.m: a clay top with snowflake designs

entries: With a word of power and a subtle gyration, frigid gales and shards of razor-sharp ice whirl around you to devastating effect. Each creature within 15 feet of you must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 3d8} cold damage and {@damage 3d8} slashing damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. The cloud of ice spreads around corners. Items that are not being worn or carried are damaged by the spell as well.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d8} cold or {@dice 2d8} slashing, your choice, for each slot level above 5th.
